description: Spanish police investigate Nacho Vidal over the death of a man who inhaled a psychedelic substance.
title: Porn star Nacho Vidal held in Spain after man dies in toad-venom ritual
title_page: Porn star Nacho Vidal held in Spain after man dies in toad-venom ritual - BBC News
maintext: The toad, also known as the Colorado River toad, uses the powerful toxin to defend itself against predators in Mexico and south-western US states, where it is found in the Sonoran Desert.
